线上配置 共两套 服务器地址192.168.8.3和192.168.8.4 两台服务器用户名一模一样 请分别连接使用
tgn01-tgn66 66个国内sha255
tgj01-tgj16   16个国际sha255

t83601,t83602,t83603,t83604,t83607,t83608 6个国内sha836
t83609,t83610 2个国际sha836

t52501,t52502,t52504 3个国内can525
t52503 1个国际can525

t40701,t40702,t40704 3个国内bjs407
t40703 1个国际bjs407

t56601,t56602,t56604 3个国内pek566
t56603 1个国际pek566

测试配置服务器地址192.168.8.82
tx25501-tx25510共10个  office号为sha255
用户名tx836 office号为sha836
用户名tx566 office号为pek566
用户名tx407 office号为bjs407
用户名tx525 office号为can525




线上服务器的分布情况：

	eterm_if_tdxinfo_com {
                server 192.168.241.82:8980 weight=8 max_fails=2 fail_timeout=5s;
                server 192.168.241.83:8980 weight=8 max_fails=2 fail_timeout=5s;
                server 192.168.241.84:8980 weight=8 max_fails=2 fail_timeout=5s;
                server 192.168.241.84:8981 weight=8 max_fails=2 fail_timeout=5s;
                server 192.168.241.84:8982 weight=8 max_fails=2 fail_timeout=5s;
                server 192.168.241.84:8983 weight=8 max_fails=2 fail_timeout=5s;
                server 192.168.241.51:8984 weight=8 max_fails=2 fail_timeout=5s;
                server 192.168.241.51:8985 weight=8 max_fails=2 fail_timeout=5s;
        }
      	etermgj_if_tdxinfo_com {
                server 192.168.241.83:9180 weight=1 max_fails=2 fail_timeout=5s;
                server 192.168.241.84:8988 weight=1 max_fails=2 fail_timeout=5s;
                server 192.168.241.51:8986 weight=1 max_fails=2 fail_timeout=5s;
                server 192.168.241.51:8987 weight=1 max_fails=2 fail_timeout=5s;
        }



真正的配置是不存在换行的，只是为了配置好看而已
beta配置：
config=
192.168.250.18-8580-SHA255-cdxg:192.168.8.82_352_tx25507,tx25508;
192.168.250.18-8680-SHA255-cdxg:192.168.8.82_352_tx25509,tx25510;
192.168.250.19-8080-SHA255-cdxg:192.168.8.82_352_tx25509;
192.168.250.18-8580-BJS407-cdxg,192.168.250.18-8680-BJS407-cdxg,192.168.250.19-8080-BJS407-cdxg:192.168.8.82_352_tx407;
192.168.250.18-8580-CAN525-cdxg,192.168.250.18-8680-CAN525-cdxg,192.168.250.19-8080-CAN525-cdxg:192.168.8.82_352_tx525;
192.168.250.18-8580-SHA836-cdxg,192.168.250.18-8680-SHA836-cdxg,192.168.250.19-8080-SHA836-cdxg:192.168.8.82_352_tx836;
192.168.250.18-8580-PEK566-cdxg,192.168.250.18-8680-PEK566-cdxg,192.168.250.19-8080-PEK566-cdxg:192.168.8.82_352_tx566



线上配置：
config=
//国内
192.168.241.82-8980-SHA255-cdxg:192.168.8.3_352_tgn02,tgn03,tgn04,tgn05,tgn06,tgn07,tgn08,tgn09;
192.168.241.83-8980-SHA255-cdxg:192.168.8.3_352_tgn10,tgn11,tgn12,tgn13,tgn14,tgn15,tgn16,tgn17;
192.168.241.84-8980-SHA255-cdxg:192.168.8.3_352_tgn18,tgn19,tgn20,tgn21,tgn22,tgn23,tgn24,tgn25;
192.168.241.84-8981-SHA255-cdxg:192.168.8.3_352_tgn26,tgn27,tgn28,tgn29,tgn30,tgn31,tgn32,tgn33;
192.168.241.84-8982-SHA255-cdxg:192.168.8.4_352_tgn34,tgn35,tgn36,tgn37,tgn38,tgn39,tgn40,tgn41;
192.168.241.84-8983-SHA255-cdxg:192.168.8.4_352_tgn42,tgn43,tgn44,tgn45,tgn46,tgn47,tgn48,tgn49;
192.168.241.51-8984-SHA255-cdxg:192.168.8.4_352_tgn50,tgn51,tgn52,tgn53,tgn54,tgn55,tgn56,tgn57;
192.168.241.51-8985-SHA255-cdxg:192.168.8.4_352_tgn58,tgn59,tgn60,tgn61,tgn62,tgn63,tgn64,tgn65;

192.168.241.82-8980-BJS407-cdxg,192.168.241.83-8980-BJS407-cdxg,192.168.241.84-8980-BJS407-cdxg,192.168.241.84-8981-BJS407-cdxg:192.168.8.3_352_t40701,t40704;
192.168.241.84-8982-BJS407-cdxg,192.168.241.84-8983-BJS407-cdxg,192.168.241.51-8984-BJS407-cdxg,192.168.241.51-8985-BJS407-cdxg:192.168.8.4_352_t40702,t40704;
192.168.241.82-8980-SHA836-cdxg,192.168.241.83-8980-SHA836-cdxg,192.168.241.84-8980-SHA836-cdxg,192.168.241.84-8981-SHA836-cdxg:192.168.8.3_352_t83601,t83602,t83603;
192.168.241.84-8982-SHA836-cdxg,192.168.241.84-8983-SHA836-cdxg,192.168.241.51-8984-SHA836-cdxg,192.168.241.51-8985-SHA836-cdxg:192.168.8.4_352_t83604,t83607,t83608;
192.168.241.82-8980-CAN525-cdxg,192.168.241.83-8980-CAN525-cdxg,192.168.241.84-8980-CAN525-cdxg,192.168.241.84-8981-CAN525-cdxg:192.168.8.3_352_t52501,t52504;
192.168.241.84-8982-CAN525-cdxg,192.168.241.84-8983-CAN525-cdxg,192.168.241.51-8984-CAN525-cdxg,192.168.241.51-8985-CAN525-cdxg:192.168.8.4_352_t52502,t52504;
192.168.241.82-8980-PEK566-cdxg,192.168.241.83-8980-PEK566-cdxg,192.168.241.84-8980-PEK566-cdxg,192.168.241.84-8981-PEK566-cdxg:192.168.8.3_352_t56601,t56604;
192.168.241.84-8982-PEK566-cdxg,192.168.241.84-8983-PEK566-cdxg,192.168.241.51-8984-PEK566-cdxg,192.168.241.51-8985-PEK566-cdxg:192.168.8.4_352_t56602,t56604;
//国际
192.168.241.83-9180-SHA255-cdxg:192.168.8.3_352_tgj01,tgj02,tgj03,tgj04;
192.168.241.51-8986-SHA255-cdxg:192.168.8.3_352_tgj05,tgj06,tgj07,tgj08;
192.168.241.51-8987-SHA255-cdxg:192.168.8.4_352_tgj09,tgj10,tgj11,tgj12;
192.168.241.84-8988-SHA255-cdxg:192.168.8.4_352_tgj13,tgj14,tgj15,tgj16;

192.168.241.83-9180-BJS407-cdxg,192.168.241.51-8986-BJS407-cdxg:192.168.8.3_352_t40703;
192.168.241.51-8987-BJS407-cdxg,192.168.241.84-8988-BJS407-cdxg:192.168.8.4_352_t40703;
192.168.241.83-9180-SHA836-cdxg,192.168.241.51-8986-SHA836-cdxg:192.168.8.3_352_t83609;
192.168.241.51-8987-SHA836-cdxg,192.168.241.84-8988-SHA836-cdxg:192.168.8.4_352_t83610;
192.168.241.83-9180-CAN525-cdxg,192.168.241.51-8986-CAN525-cdxg:192.168.8.3_352_t52503;
192.168.241.51-8987-CAN525-cdxg,192.168.241.84-8988-CAN525-cdxg:192.168.8.4_352_t52503;
192.168.241.83-9180-PEK566-cdxg,192.168.241.51-8986-PEK566-cdxg:192.168.8.3_352_t56603;
192.168.241.51-8987-PEK566-cdxg,192.168.241.84-8988-PEK566-cdxg:192.168.8.4_352_t56603;
//批量导入和删除pnr
192.168.241.50-8880-SHA255-cdxg:192.168.8.3_352_tgn01;
192.168.241.51-8880-SHA255-cdxg:192.168.8.4_352_tgn66




loadblance配置如下：

国内的域名：
eterm.if.tdxinfo.com
服务器：
192.168.241.82:8980,192.168.241.83:8980,192.168.241.84:8980,192.168.241.84:8981,192.168.241.84:8982,192.168.241.84:8983,192.168.241.84:8984,192.168.241.84:8985

国际域名：
etermgj.if.tdxinfo.com
服务器：
192.168.241.83:9180,192.168.241.84:8986,192.168.241.84:8987,192.168.241.84:8988

批量导入和删除pnr：
pnr-import.eterm.if.tdxinfo.com
服务器：
192.168.241.50:8880,192.168.241.51:8880


临时配置
192.168.8.3改为192.168.160.123
192.168.8.4改为192.168.130.104
192.168.8.82改为192.168.160.121




config=192.168.241.82-8980-SHA255-cdxg:192.168.160.123_352_tgn02,tgn03,tgn04,tgn05,tgn06,tgn07,tgn08,tgn09;192.168.241.83-8980-SHA255-cdxg:192.168.160.123_352_tgn10,tgn11,tgn12,tgn13,tgn14,tgn15,tgn16,tgn17;192.168.241.84-8980-SHA255-cdxg:192.168.160.123_352_tgn18,tgn19,tgn20,tgn21,tgn22,tgn23,tgn24,tgn25;192.168.241.84-8981-SHA255-cdxg:192.168.160.123_352_tgn26,tgn27,tgn28,tgn29,tgn30,tgn31,tgn32,tgn33;192.168.241.84-8982-SHA255-cdxg:192.168.130.104_352_tgn34,tgn35,tgn36,tgn37,tgn38,tgn39,tgn40,tgn41;192.168.241.84-8983-SHA255-cdxg:192.168.130.104_352_tgn42,tgn43,tgn44,tgn45,tgn46,tgn47,tgn48,tgn49;192.168.241.51-8984-SHA255-cdxg:192.168.130.104_352_tgn50,tgn51,tgn52,tgn53,tgn54,tgn55,tgn56,tgn57;192.168.241.51-8985-SHA255-cdxg:192.168.130.104_352_tgn58,tgn59,tgn60,tgn61,tgn62,tgn63,tgn64,tgn65;192.168.241.82-8980-BJS407-cdxg,192.168.241.83-8980-BJS407-cdxg,192.168.241.84-8980-BJS407-cdxg,192.168.241.84-8981-BJS407-cdxg:192.168.160.123_352_t40701,t40704;192.168.241.84-8982-BJS407-cdxg,192.168.241.84-8983-BJS407-cdxg,192.168.241.51-8984-BJS407-cdxg,192.168.241.51-8985-BJS407-cdxg:192.168.130.104_352_t40702,t40704;192.168.241.82-8980-SHA836-cdxg,192.168.241.83-8980-SHA836-cdxg,192.168.241.84-8980-SHA836-cdxg,192.168.241.84-8981-SHA836-cdxg:192.168.160.123_352_t83601,t83602,t83603;192.168.241.84-8982-SHA836-cdxg,192.168.241.84-8983-SHA836-cdxg,192.168.241.51-8984-SHA836-cdxg,192.168.241.51-8985-SHA836-cdxg:192.168.130.104_352_t83604,t83607,t83608;192.168.241.82-8980-CAN525-cdxg,192.168.241.83-8980-CAN525-cdxg,192.168.241.84-8980-CAN525-cdxg,192.168.241.84-8981-CAN525-cdxg:192.168.160.123_352_t52501,t52504;192.168.241.84-8982-CAN525-cdxg,192.168.241.84-8983-CAN525-cdxg,192.168.241.51-8984-CAN525-cdxg,192.168.241.51-8985-CAN525-cdxg:192.168.130.104_352_t52502,t52504;192.168.241.82-8980-PEK566-cdxg,192.168.241.83-8980-PEK566-cdxg,192.168.241.84-8980-PEK566-cdxg,192.168.241.84-8981-PEK566-cdxg:192.168.160.123_352_t56601,t56604;192.168.241.84-8982-PEK566-cdxg,192.168.241.84-8983-PEK566-cdxg,192.168.241.51-8984-PEK566-cdxg,192.168.241.51-8985-PEK566-cdxg:192.168.130.104_352_t56602,t56604;192.168.241.83-9180-SHA255-cdxg:192.168.160.123_352_tgj01,tgj02,tgj03,tgj04;192.168.241.51-8986-SHA255-cdxg:192.168.160.123_352_tgj05,tgj06,tgj07,tgj08;192.168.241.51-8987-SHA255-cdxg:192.168.130.104_352_tgj09,tgj10,tgj11,tgj12;192.168.241.84-8988-SHA255-cdxg:192.168.130.104_352_tgj13,tgj14,tgj15,tgj16;192.168.241.83-9180-BJS407-cdxg,192.168.241.51-8986-BJS407-cdxg:192.168.160.123_352_t40703;192.168.241.51-8987-BJS407-cdxg,192.168.241.84-8988-BJS407-cdxg:192.168.130.104_352_t40703;192.168.241.83-9180-SHA836-cdxg,192.168.241.51-8986-SHA836-cdxg:192.168.160.123_352_t83609;192.168.241.51-8987-SHA836-cdxg,192.168.241.84-8988-SHA836-cdxg:192.168.130.104_352_t83610;192.168.241.83-9180-CAN525-cdxg,192.168.241.51-8986-CAN525-cdxg:192.168.160.123_352_t52503;192.168.241.51-8987-CAN525-cdxg,192.168.241.84-8988-CAN525-cdxg:192.168.130.104_352_t52503;192.168.241.83-9180-PEK566-cdxg,192.168.241.51-8986-PEK566-cdxg:192.168.160.123_352_t56603;192.168.241.51-8987-PEK566-cdxg,192.168.241.84-8988-PEK566-cdxg:192.168.130.104_352_t56603;192.168.241.50-8880-SHA255-cdxg:192.168.160.123_352_tgn01;192.168.241.51-8880-SHA255-cdxg:192.168.130.104_352_tgn66
